text: @SecPompeo Anthony “Tony” Fauci has become the scientific face of America’s COVID-19 response&he says the best evidence shows the virus behind the pandemic WAS NOT MADE IN A LAB in China. In Dr FAUCI WE TRUST,certainly NOT you,quit trying to manipulate him! Dr Fauci stand up SPEAK THE TRUTH
